title: Make all text render bright white across the app

requirements.text: Update the global theme text color tokens so that all standard text colors render as bright white across the entire UI (including default text, muted text, and component foreground variants).

quotes: change all the font colours to white. bright white

acceptanceCriteria: The Tailwind `text-foreground` color renders as pure/bright white on all pages.
Tailwind classes that currently render non-white text via theme tokens (e.g., `text-muted-foreground`, `text-card-foreground`, `text-popover-foreground`, etc.) now render bright white as well.
No page shows gray/green-tinted body text due to theme variables; text is consistently bright white in both normal and dark mode.

requirements.text: Audit and update any hard-coded non-white text utility classes in the appâ€™s components/pages so they also render bright white (e.g., any `text-red-*`, `text-gray-*`, or similar explicit color utilities).

quotes: change all the font colours to white. bright white

acceptanceCriteria: No visible text uses hard-coded non-white Tailwind text colors anywhere in the app UI.
The footer attribution line (including the heart icon/text) renders in bright white.
Links and hover states remain readable and do not introduce non-white text colors.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI sources must be composed, not edited).
Keep changes limited to styling/utility usage; do not alter app behavior, routing, or backend APIs.
nonGoals: Changing background colors, textures, or layout beyond what is necessary to make text bright white.
Rebranding or redesigning the UI beyond font color changes.
